original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (6)
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya

original: 18.7. Hetuduka, Mahantaradukādi
analyzed: hetu duka mahantara duka ādi

original: Hetuṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetum sa ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na sa ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ anārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu naanārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum anārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na na hetu na anārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ cittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum cittam dhammam paṭicca na na hetu no cittaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Hetuṁ nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nanocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetum no cittam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na no cittaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

analyzed: hetum cetasikam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na cetasikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
